job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtDeep Analytics LLC DA is a startup RampampD company located in Montpelier Vermont DA focuses on winning Government and commercial RampampD projects in the areas of machine learning ML and sensor development Due to recent project wins we are looking for an additional hire to help us build ML solutions We are specifically looking for people with 5 years of experience in taking ML techniques described in the literature or on Github and applying those techniques to build custom ML solutions for our customers Ideally a successful candidate will have experience in the following areasltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt1	Developing test plans and collecting field data from sensorsltpgtltpgt2	Building datasets for training ML algorithmsltpgtltpgt3	Performing data analysis in a Linux environment mandatory requirementltpgtltpgt4	Training ML algorithms eg CNNs GANs using realworld dataltpgtltpgt5	Training ML algorithms using TensorFlow and PyTorchltpgtltpgt6	Exporting and optimizing ML models for inference on embedded platformsltpgtltpgt7	Strong Python experienceltpgtltpgt8	Developing custom signal  image processing schemes to process sensor dataltpgtltpgt9	Executing technical work collaboratively in an RampampD environmentltpgtltpgt10	Working on US Department of Defense projectsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe nature of our small business requires everyone on the team to wear lots of different hats Successful hires will perform solid technical work have a passion for learning and have an interest or demonstrated experience in writing proposals Candidates must be selfstarting problem solvers and will be expected to design implement and test algorithms with limited guidance under deadlineampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtCandidates will have the freedom to provide direction to projects and company initiatives Interested applicants should submit a resume and a cover letter summarizing projects completed by the applicant that are relevant to this job posting Due to the nature of DAs projects US citizenship is required Please send application materials and position inquiries to philipstimacdeepanalyticsllccomltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
